name: Revolt of Jpegia
description:
You play as a dragon called Asivor. You reside in the country of Jpegia with your brother Swart.

One day, your brother made a post about his distaste of The President's new law, which makes human enforcers take a pill that makes their skin invisible, showing off the flesh and muscle underneath.

Swart was found dead the next morning. It was quickly swept under the rug, but you know what happened. You must defeat The President to avenge your brother, but you'll have to get through his minions first!

Controls:

Move with WASD

Shoot with Left Click
